vernac_cmds: Notation "<< x , y >>" := (exist Descl x y) (at level 0, x, y at level 100).
Lemma left_prefix : forall x y z : List, ltl (x ++ y) z -> ltl x z.
apply (Lt_hd A leA); auto with sets.
apply (HInd y y0); auto with sets.
Lemma right_prefix : forall x y z : List, ltl x (y ++ z) -> ltl x y \/ (exists y' : List, x = y ++ y' /\ ltl y' z).
left; apply (Lt_hd A leA); auto with sets.
left; apply (Lt_tl A leA); auto with sets.
right; exists x2; auto with sets.
Lemma desc_prefix : forall (x : List) (a : A), Descl (x ++ [a]) -> Descl x.
Lemma desc_tail : forall (x : List) (a b : A), Descl (b :: x ++ [a]) -> clos_refl_trans A leA a b.
apply rev_ind with (P := fun x : List => forall a b : A, Descl (b :: x ++ [a]) -> clos_refl_trans A leA a b); intros.
assert ([b; a] = ([] ++ [b]) ++ [a]) by auto with sets.
inversion H1; subst; [ apply rt_step; assumption | apply rt_refl ].
apply rt_trans with (y := x0); auto with sets.
enough (H5 : clos_refl A leA a x0) by (inversion H5; subst; [ apply rt_step | apply rt_refl ]; assumption).
Lemma dist_aux : forall z : List, Descl z -> forall x y : List, z = x ++ y -> Descl x /\ Descl y.
induction D as [| | * H D Hind]; intros.
assert (H0 : x ++ y = []) by auto with sets.
assert (E : x0 ++ y = [x]) by auto with sets.
induction y0 using rev_ind in x0, H0 |- *.
induction y0 using rev_ind in x1, x0, H0 |- *.
Lemma dist_Desc_concat : forall x y : List, Descl (x ++ y) -> Descl x /\ Descl y.
apply (dist_aux (x ++ y) H x y); auto with sets.
Lemma desc_end : forall (a b : A) (x : List), Descl (x ++ [a]) /\ ltl (x ++ [a]) [b] -> clos_trans A leA a b.
generalize (desc_tail l a a0 H0); intro.
eapply clos_rt_t; [ eassumption | apply t_step; assumption ].
Lemma ltl_unit : forall (x : List) (a b : A), Descl (x ++ [a]) -> ltl (x ++ [a]) [b] -> ltl x [b].
apply (Lt_hd A leA a b); auto with sets.
Lemma acc_app : forall (x1 x2 : List) (y1 : Descl (x1 ++ x2)), Acc Lex_Exp << x1 ++ x2, y1 >> -> forall (x : List) (y : Descl x), ltl x (x1 ++ x2) -> Acc Lex_Exp << x, y >>.
unfold lex_exp; simpl; auto with sets.
Theorem wf_lex_exp : well_founded leA -> well_founded Lex_Exp.
simple induction a; intros x y.
apply rev_ind with (A := A) (P := fun x : List => forall (x0 : List) (y : Descl x0), ltl x0 x -> Acc Lex_Exp << x0, y >>).

apply GR with (P := fun x0 : A => forall l : List, (forall (x1 : List) (y : Descl x1), ltl x1 l -> Acc Lex_Exp << x1, y >>) -> forall (x1 : List) (y : Descl x1), ltl x1 (l ++ [x0]) -> Acc Lex_Exp << x1, y >>).
apply rev_ind with (A := A) (P := fun x3 : List => forall y1 : Descl (l ++ x3), ltl x3 [x1] -> Acc Lex_Exp << l ++ x3, y1 >>).
apply (H0 x4 y3); auto with sets.
generalize (desc_end x4 x1 l0 (conj H8 H5)); intros.
generalize (HInd x4 H9 (l ++ l0)); intros HInd2.
generalize (ltl_unit l0 x4 x1 H8 H5); intro.

command: apply (Lt_hd A leA); auto with sets.
apply (HInd y y0); auto with sets.
left; apply (Lt_hd A leA); auto with sets.
left; apply (Lt_tl A leA); auto with sets.
right; exists x2; auto with sets.
apply rev_ind with (P := fun x : List => forall a b : A, Descl (b :: x ++ [a]) -> clos_refl_trans A leA a b); intros.
assert ([b; a] = ([] ++ [b]) ++ [a]) by auto with sets.
inversion H1; subst; [ apply rt_step; assumption | apply rt_refl ].
apply rt_trans with (y := x0); auto with sets.
enough (H5 : clos_refl A leA a x0) by (inversion H5; subst; [ apply rt_step | apply rt_refl ]; assumption).
induction D as [| | * H D Hind]; intros.
assert (H0 : x ++ y = []) by auto with sets.
assert (E : x0 ++ y = [x]) by auto with sets.
induction y0 using rev_ind in x0, H0 |- *.
induction y0 using rev_ind in x1, x0, H0 |- *.
apply (dist_aux (x ++ y) H x y); auto with sets.
generalize (desc_tail l a a0 H0); intro.
eapply clos_rt_t; [ eassumption | apply t_step; assumption ].
apply (Lt_hd A leA a b); auto with sets.
unfold lex_exp; simpl; auto with sets.
simple induction a; intros x y.
apply rev_ind with (A := A) (P := fun x : List => forall (x0 : List) (y : Descl x0), ltl x0 x -> Acc Lex_Exp << x0, y >>).

apply GR with (P := fun x0 : A => forall l : List, (forall (x1 : List) (y : Descl x1), ltl x1 l -> Acc Lex_Exp << x1, y >>) -> forall (x1 : List) (y : Descl x1), ltl x1 (l ++ [x0]) -> Acc Lex_Exp << x1, y >>).
apply rev_ind with (A := A) (P := fun x3 : List => forall y1 : Descl (l ++ x3), ltl x3 [x1] -> Acc Lex_Exp << l ++ x3, y1 >>).
apply (H0 x4 y3); auto with sets.
generalize (desc_end x4 x1 l0 (conj H8 H5)); intros.
generalize (HInd x4 H9 (l ++ l0)); intros HInd2.
generalize (ltl_unit l0 x4 x1 H8 H5); intro.
